summary: This Presidential action designates various individuals as Chairmen, Acting Chairmen, and Chairs of multiple federal agencies and commissions. The appointments appear to be made at the start of a new presidential administration on January 20, 2025. The designations cover key regulatory and administrative bodies including the FCC, FERC, FTC, NLRB, SEC, EEOC, FDIC, and several others. Several positions are designated as 'Acting' chairs, suggesting these may be temporary appointments pending formal nomination and confirmation processes.
eli5: The President picked new leaders for different government groups that help run the country. Some people will be permanent leaders, while others will be temporary leaders until permanent ones are chosen.
issues: The document is dated January 20, 2025, which appears to be a future date
No mention of the legal authority under which these appointments are made
Unclear whether these appointments require Senate confirmation
No specification of terms of office or duration for acting appointments
No indication of whether previous chairs have resigned or been removed
